definitions.definition: Having no point or sharp tip ; terminating squarely or in a rounded end.
Having no prominent or important feature, as of an argument , discourse , etc.
examples: The sequel to the film was even more pointless than the original

definitions.definition: Having no purpose ; purposeless ; unable to effect an aim.
examples: Since the decision has already been made, further discussion seems pointless .
After four matches and four defeats, United remain pointless at the foot of the table.

definitions.definition: Point-free ; employing the tacit programming paradigm.

main_definition: Having no point or sharp tip ; terminating squarely or in a rounded end.
secondary_definitions: Having no prominent or important feature, as of an argument , discourse , etc.
Having no purpose ; purposeless ; unable to effect an aim.
( programming , derogatory ) Point-free ; employing the tacit programming paradigm.
